Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 2913.67

[shortdesc]

3M Nomad Medium Traffic Backed Scraper Matting, 6050, black, 3 ft x 82 ft (0.9 m x 25 m)

  • 3M™ Nomad™ Medium Traffic Backed Scraper Matting 6050 is a carpet-like floor matting that traps dirt and water, keeping both off floors
  • It is stain and crush-resistant, with a dual-fiber construction.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Continually provides a cleaner floor at the entrance and throughout the facility
  • Helps protect the floor from damage due to tracked-in soil and other debris
  • Helps to reduce the time and effort needed to clean and maintain floors
  • Reduces dirt and water on hard floors, which can help reduce slips and falls
  • Random pattern design that provides attractive functionality
  • Low profile allows foot, cart and wheelchair traffic to move easily over the mat

Type: Sorbent Products
Price: 428.18

[shortdesc]

3M Petroleum Sorbent Double Boom, T-280, 102 mm x 3 m (4 in x 10 ft)

  • 3M™ Petroleum Sorbent Double Boom, T-280 is a 10-foot (3 m) long petroleum sorbent double boom with two 4 inch (102 mm) encased tubes of particulate sorbent material secured by a UV resistant netting
  • Built-in attachment clips are provided at each end of the boom, allowing the booms to be linked together, overlapping and preventing seepage between segments.

  • UV-resistant
  • will not deteriorate or disintegrate

entry.title: 3M T-8 - PetRolleum Sorbent Mini-Boom 6 Mini-Boo 7000001922
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Sorbent Products
Price: 160.31

[shortdesc]

3M Petroleum Sorbent Mini-Boom, T-8, 76 mm x 2.5 m (3 in x 8 ft)

  • 3M Petroleum Sorbent Mini-Boom, T-8 is used to encircle spills and to contain leaks
  • It is selective sorbent, which will Inchsorb Inch hydrocarbon-based liquids (oleophilic) and repel aqueous-based liquids (hydrophobic)
  • A 3-inch (7.6 cm) diameter scrim on the outside of the boom identifies the use while containing particulate sorbent material
  • The T-8 mini-boom is 8 feet (2.4 m) in length
  • A case weighs 12 pounds (5.4 kg)
  • Each case contains 6 booms (each 3 inches (7.6 cm) in diameter by 8 feet (2.4 m)) which will sorb 2 gallons (9 litre) each.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Sorbent Products

    Product Information

  • Ideal for placing around equipment
  • Helps prevent leaks/spills from spreading to adjacent areas
  • Scrim on the outside of mini-boom identifies the use while containing particulate Sorbent material
